cause.description:
Employing a resident company or regional professional performers and artists of the highest caliber, Vpstart Crow is dedicated to breaking down the barriers between audience and actors in a performance style that is lively, thought provoking and vpstartling. BUT there's more to putting on a show than just the costumes, set, lights, props, and sound. There's also the theater rental, storage fees, programs, posters, and a variety of other costs - all of which Vpstart Crow takes on in order to bring you the highest quality theatre we can provide. Please join our cause and make a generous gift today. For more information, visit our site at http://www.vpstartcrow.com.
1. Producing live theatre as a vital, accessible and exciting part of the life of our community
2. Breaking down the barriers between audience and actors in a performance style that is lively, thought provoking and vpstartling
cause.mission: Producing live theatre as a vital, accessible and exciting part of the life of our community
cause.name: Support Vpstart Crow Productions
